items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: yevhenlisovenko/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight React + Go app to chat with Ollama models. Fully containerized and backed by PostgreSQL for persistent conversations.
items.title: shahinrahimi/gochatai: A lightweight React + Go app to chat with Ollama models. Fully containerized and backed by PostgreSQL for persistent conversations.

items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
items.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.

items.content_html: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly
items.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources.  Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
items.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
